editor.group_condition_icons_helper: Use grouped weather condition icons when multiple forecast entries share the same visual condition.
editor.show_condition_labels_helper: Display weather condition names next to icons in grouped mode. Labels are hidden if there is insufficient space.
editor.condition_colors_helper: Enable condition-based background and icon coloring for forecasts.
editor.condition_color_map_helper: Optional JSON map to override foreground/background colors for specific conditions.
